Class StaffTest

java.lang.Object
test.StaffTest
public class StaffTest extends Object
JUnit4 tests for Staff / DiscussionBoardDAO features.

    testCreateQuestionAndAnswer()
    Tests that creating a question and answer persists correctly and that they can be retrieved from the DAO.
    void
    testFlaggingAndNotes()
    Tests that staff can flag items and add notes to flagged items.
    void
    testMessagingAndLogs()
    Tests the staff messaging feature and ensures that log entries are recorded when messages are sent.
    void
    testPrivateFeedback()
    Tests adding private feedback for a question and checks that the feedback count increases properly.
    void
    testTasksLifecycle()
    Tests the life cycle of tasks: adding a task, resolving it, and ensuring the task list updates correctly.
